statements: SELECT * FROM consumer_behavior_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT consumer_id, age, income FROM consumer_behavior_data WHERE age > 25;
SELECT * FROM consumer_behavior_data WHERE income >= 50000 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT consumer_id, purchase_history FROM consumer_behavior_data WHERE purchase_history->>'product' = 'Shoes';
SELECT consumer_id, marketing_campaign FROM consumer_behavior_data WHERE income BETWEEN 30000 AND 60000 ORDER BY consumer_id;
SELECT * FROM consumer_behavior_data WHERE age > 30 AND income > 50000 ORDER BY age DESC, income ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT consumer_id, gender, income FROM consumer_behavior_data WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY income DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM consumer_behavior_data WHERE consumer_id = '78b81ab6-57c4-4e94-af9a-43f0c4658de1'
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM consumer_behavior_data WHERE gender IS NOT NULL ORDER BY gender ASC

SELECT consumer_id, purchase_history->'purchase_date', purchase_history->'product_name' FROM consumer_behavior_data WHERE purchase_history->>'product_category' = 'electronics' ORDER BY consumer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM research_proposal
SELECT proposal_name, researcher_name, research_topic FROM research_proposal ORDER BY proposal_name ASC
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic, budget FROM research_proposal WHERE budget > 5000
SELECT * FROM consumer_behavior_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT action_taken, COUNT(*) FROM consumer_behavior_data GROUP BY action_taken
SELECT * FROM research_proposal WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT research_topic, proposal_name, budget FROM research_proposal WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM research_proposal WHERE research_topic LIKE '%machine learning%' AND budget BETWEEN 5000 AND 15000 ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT proposal_name, research_topic, budget FROM research_proposal WHERE researcher_name IN ('Alice Smith', 'Bob Johnson') AND budget > 5000;
SELECT proposal_name, researcher_name, budget FROM research_proposal ORDER BY researcher_name ASC, budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM Customer WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT customer_name, age, location FROM Customer WHERE location='New York';
SELECT * FROM Purchase WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT research_topic, research_date FROM MarketResearch WHERE result_text LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY research_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customer ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, location FROM Customer WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age FROM Customer WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM Purchase WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT research_id, research_topic, researcher_name FROM MarketResearch WHERE research_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, age FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, product_name, rating FROM Feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT Customers.name, Purchases.product_name, Purchases.price FROM Customers JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id WHERE Customers.gender = 'Female';
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, Products.category FROM Feedback JOIN Products ON Feedback.product_id = Products.product_id GROUP BY Products.category;
SELECT Customers.name, Feedback.rating, Feedback.comment FROM Customers JOIN Feedback ON Customers.customer_id = Feedback.customer_id WHERE Feedback.rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM research_proposals;
SELECT proposal_title, proposal_description FROM research_proposals WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM market_segments ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT profile_name, age, gender, location FROM consumer_profiles WHERE age > 25;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_details WHERE stock_quantity > 0 AND price < 1000;
SELECT * FROM research_proposals;
SELECT profile_id, profile_name, age, gender FROM consumer_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT proposal_id, proposal_title, researcher_id FROM research_proposals ORDER BY proposal_id DESC;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM market_segments WHERE segment_id = 2;
SELECT transaction_id, purchase_date, product_name, price FROM purchase_history JOIN product_details ON purchase_history.product_id = product_details.product_id;
